name: Treasure Panther
description:
FLIP: You can send 1 Normal Monster from your Deck to the GY.
If a Set monster is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can target up to 3 Set monsters on the field; change them to Attack Position, then if you changed 3 monsters to Attack Position, inflict 900 damage to your opponent. You can only use each effect of "Treasure Panther" once per turn.
